page.title: 09Pimperne First School.
page.content: Pimperne First School is a church of England First School.It has 110 children of 4 to 9 years of age.They come from Pimperne and the Tarrant villages of Hinton,Gunville,Monkton and Launceston.The school was built in about 1908 and extended in 1972 when many new houses were built in Pimperne.There are four class rooms and four full time teachers including the Headmaster Mr Reed who has been here for twenty years.The school is in pleasant surroundings including a playing field.It also has a swimming pool,a computer,a video recorder and a television.
